808cargo работает с клиентами в три прос: 808cargo works with customers in three simple stages. First, you contact our representative by phone or via a feedback form. After discussing the cargo details, you make a request and submit a payment. That's it: the rest of the work is completely covered by us. If necessary, we can request additional documents from you. At any time, you can check the shipment's location.
Вы связываетесь с нашим менеджером и офо: You contact our manager and make an application, providing the necessary documents;
Мы получаем и полностью сопровождаем гру: We receive and fully accompany your cargo from China to Russia;
Ваш представитель получает груз на месте: Your representative receives the cargo on site and acknowledges the work performed.
